headline: Otis Worldwide Corporation (OTIS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Otis Worldwide Corporation on Timeless’s Substack by Timeless Compounders. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on OTIS. Otis Worldwide Corporation’s share was trading at $87.16 as of January 29th. OTIS’s trailing and forward P/E were 24.90 and 19.65, respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
